name: Payer
label: payer
definition: a party who pays a bill or fees, or who makes payments to a payee in partial or complete fulfillment of an obligation

name: PaymentObligation
definition: legally enforceable duty to pay a sum of money according to the terms stated in a contract
label: payment obligation

name: PaymentEvent
definition: an event that involves delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation
label: payment event

name: PaymentSchedule
label: payment schedule
definition: schedule for delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation

name: Payment
definition: delivery of money in fulfillment of an obligation, such as to satisfy a claim or debt
label: payment

name: Payee
label: payee
definition: a party to whom a debt should be paid, or to whose order a bill of exchange, note, or check is made payable, or who receives or will receive a payment from a payer in partial or complete fulfillment of an obligation

name: fulfillsObligation
label: fulfills obligation
definition: satisfies a requirement for payment of some claim, debt, or other obligation

name: hasPaymentAmount
label: has payment amount
definition: specifies the amount of money involved in a payment

name: hasPaymentSchedule
definition: specifies the schedule for fulfillment of an obligation
label: has payment schedule
